alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:49PM CDT until June 17 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL THOMAS...NORTHEASTERN LOGAN AND NORTHWESTERN GOVE COUNTIES... At 1049 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Monument, or 6 miles southwest of Oakley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Oakley. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 68 and 79. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
